subject: Climate & Environment
title: Keystone Species
description: A quick, practical guide to Keystone Species.

hook.text: Remove one species and the whole ecosystem changes. These are called keystone species.

buildup.text: Sea otters eat sea urchins. Without otters, urchins devour kelp forests entirely.
